General.Name: Caledonian Trust PLC
General.Description: Caledonian Trust PLC engages in the property investment and development business in the United Kingdom. Its properties include office spaces, garages, and public house/restaurant. The company was formerly known as Towngrade Securities plc and changed its name to Caledonian Trust PLC in June 1988. Caledonian Trust PLC was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Edinburgh, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 61A North Castle Street, Edinburgh, United Kingdom, EH2 3LJ

1.Name: Mr. Michael James Baynham L.L.B., LL.B. (Hons)
1.Title: Legal & Fin. Director, Group Company Sec. and Exec. Director
